about_the_game:
Shredded Faith transports players into a vast and immersive fantasy world teeming with adventure and opportunity.

Set in a universe where ancient mysteries collide with modern challenges, the game offers a diverse array of skills and activities to engage in.

Whether you're honing your combat prowess through skills like Melee, Magnetism, and Archery, or delving into the arcane arts with Devotion and Alchemy, there's something for every type of adventurer.

The game's world is alive with bustling towns, treacherous wilderness, and mysterious dungeons waiting to be explored.

Players can master the art of survival by hunting wild beasts, fishing in serene lakes, and mastering the elements with skills like Fire Making and Woodcutting.

But survival isn't just about physical prowess; it's also about nourishing the body and soul through Cooking, Farming, and the study of ancient mysteries through Magnetism and Devotion.

Crafting plays a vital role in Shredded Faith, allowing players to forge powerful weapons and armor with Smithing and Crafting skills, or create intricate furniture and structures for building and managing your own player-owned plots with Carpentry.

Whether you're a lone wanderer forging your path through the wilderness or a seasoned adventurer leading a guild to glory, "Shredded Faith" promises endless opportunities for exploration, growth, and discovery in a rich and dynamic world where every choice shapes your destiny.

content_descriptors.notes: Fighting fantasy monsters in combat, some blood particles or gore can be experienced.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 6400 2.7GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3800X
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Enter Shredded Faith, a world of ancient mysteries and modern challenges. Master combat, survival, and arcane arts while exploring towns, wilderness, and dungeons. Craft gear and shape your destiny alone or with a guild. Every choice counts in this dynamic realm of adventure.
